summary: Basic recoloring of Mehrune\'s Razor texture to be in line with classic Daedric style. Also bumped it up to 2048x2048.
descriptionHtml:
I thought the brushed steel look of Mehrune\'s Razor was kind of blah as it\'s represented in vanilla Skyrim so thought I\'d try my novice hand at re-coloring the texture and hopefully sharpening it up a bit with more pixels. This is my first texturing effort ever so please leave constructive criticisms and advice so that I might learn new techniques and improve!

Version 1.1: added oblivion symbol to the blade and generated a new normal map to improve detail.
author: Aenigmo1

files.name: Mehrunes Razor Classic Daedric Re-color v1_1
